description: Update V2: Expanded Dataset: now with or without ball gags. Updated trigger.v2a: better tensionv2b: better variety/consistencyThis is a fairly difficult Pose even for Pony XL to understand. I highly recommend an image to image workflow as described here here. https://civitai.com/articles/4451/how-to-beat-the-odds-against-the-random-noiseSample Outputs above are straight text to image though, so you can get results with this as well.If you love my work: Consider supporting the cause ;) https://ko-fi.com/joschekThis is a retrain of this SDXL Model https://civitai.com/models/326114/joscheks-rope-bondage-hogtied-and-gagged-xl-bdsm-seriesIt is heavily biased towards realism. If you don't want that you have to heavily prompt against it and/or use style lora.If you can't get good results with txt2img with this model: Try the following steps:-change your checkpoint. Some have an easier time with this pose than others-clean up your prompt. try getting the pose to work first and then selectively add your desired elements back in.-clean out your other lora: some of them may fight with this model and none of them will win.-as always: try higher steps, lower cfg. Upscaling will probably not save you on this one though. Don't Upscale before you have a decent base.-use some of the tags belowTaglistTo get the model to understand what's what, some pretty extensive manual tagging was necessary. Now the lora has a pretty long list of charged tags, that you may use (with varying effectiveness) in positive or negative: (don't go overboard though;)Perspective: From above | from side | from angle | facing viewer -- these may also be combined(From behind confused the model to much so it was removed from the dataset)Setting: On floor | on ground | on table | on bed ...Pose: arched back | head down | head back | feet crossed | feet together | knees together | knees apart feet together | elbows together | hands together elbows apartBondage related: (color) + gag | (color) + rope | natural rope | feet linked to hands | feet linked to shoulders | feet linked to hair | bound + (bodypart)Good Luck andmay the RNG-Gods bless you with the perfect seed
